ComicInfo.Title: Dome Doom!
ComicInfo.Series: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles Color Classics Vol. 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Another Mirage black-and-white classic presented in full color! In 'Dome Doom,' an innocent trip to the comic book store lands the TMNT and Casey Jones smack dab in the middle of a stupendous life-and-death battle between very real super heroes and super villains!
Reprints Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles #15.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-23 14:17:30. [CVDB441436]
